fields_of_interest: Customs, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives: DTLF (Digital Transport & Logistics Forum), CEF (Connecting Europe Facility), Horizon 2020.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Enable logistics actors to maximize benefits from a digitized logistics process with intelligent BPaaS and SaaS services.
relevant_communication:
Active: CORE (FP7). 
Past: Projects iCARGO, COMCIS, SmartCM, Freightwise. Contribution to Common Framework for electronic data interchange in transport & logistics, now standardized as part of UBL-2.1 and ISO/IEC 19845.
